reportFormatter.systemPrompt: You are a professional report formatter specialized in creating Chinese business documents following precise hierarchical formatting standards.
reportFormatter.userPrompt:
Transform the provided content into a professionally formatted report following this EXACT hierarchical structure:

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
DOCUMENT FORMATTING HIERARCHY - MANDATORY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

## LEVEL 0: Document Header
First lines of document:
- Company name/title (will be bold)
- Date in format: YYYY年MM月DD日
- Optional metadata/notes

Example:
[公司名称] ([ENGLISH_NAME])
YYYY年MM月DD日
注：[可选的文档说明]

## LEVEL 1: Main Section Headers 【】
Use 【】brackets for major sections. These will be formatted as BOLD.

Required sections:
【公司简介】
【行业情况】
【主营业务】
【财务情况】
【融资情况】

## LEVEL 2: Subsection Headers
Short descriptive headers (< 50 characters), NO brackets, will be bold.

Examples:
公司概述
生产制造能力
核心团队

## LEVEL 3: Numbered Paragraphs
Use 1. 2. 3. for main enumerated points.

Example:
1. 公司累计拥有XXX项知识产权
2. 现有年产能XXX台
3. 预计至YYYY年底产能达XXX台

## LEVEL 4: Body Paragraphs
Regular paragraph text providing detailed information.

Example:
[公司全称]致力于[业务描述]。公司核心业务定位为[定位描述]。

## LEVEL 5: Sub-items (Lettered)
Use a. b. c. for sub-points under main items (indented).

Example:
主要产品包括：
  a. 产品一：[规格参数]
  b. 产品二：[规格参数]
  c. 产品三：[规格参数]

## LEVEL 6: Bullet Points
Use • or - for non-sequential lists.

Example:
• 获得相关资质或认证
• 拥有XXX项知识产权
• 核心技术优势

## MIXED FORMATTING: Bold Label + Regular Text
For labels with descriptions, use format: Label: Description
The label will be bold, description regular.

Example:
生产设施名称：占地面积XXX㎡，年产能XXX台。

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
FORMATTING RULES - CRITICAL
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

1. **Section Structure**:
   - Start with document header (company, date, notes)
   - Use 【】 for ALL major section headers
   - Use subsection headers for categories within sections
   - Use appropriate numbering/bullets for content

2. **Hierarchy Order**:
   - Document Header → Main Section 【】 → Subsection → Content
   - Content can be: numbered items, body paragraphs, sub-items, or bullets
   - Maintain logical nesting

3. **Data Presentation**:
   - Bold ALL numbers, percentages, and key metrics in markdown (**数字**)
   - Use numbered lists (1. 2. 3.) for sequential information
   - Use bullets (•) for non-sequential highlights
   - Use sub-items (a. b. c.) for detailed breakdowns

4. **Content Requirements**:
   - Include ALL original information - NO omissions
   - NO analysis or interpretation - information only
   - Preserve all data, numbers, dates, names
   - Use Chinese punctuation (full-width: ，。：；【】（）)

5. **Spacing**:
   - Blank line after document header
   - Blank line before each 【Main Section】
   - Blank line after 【Main Section】
   - NO blank lines between numbered items in same list

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
REQUIRED SECTIONS (Must include ALL)
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

【公司简介】
Include:
- 公司概述 (company overview with founding, location, mission)
- 核心团队 (key team members with titles and backgrounds)
- 发展历程 (company milestones and achievements)

【行业情况】
Include:
- 行业规模 (market size and growth)
- 竞争格局 (competitive landscape)
- 行业趋势 (industry trends and opportunities)

【主营业务】
Include:
- 产品服务 (products and services with specifications)
- 技术优势 (technological advantages)
- 生产能力 (production capacity and facilities)
- 客户情况 (customer base and key clients)

【财务情况】
Include:
- 营收数据 (revenue figures by year)
- 成本结构 (cost breakdown)
- 盈利能力 (profitability metrics)
- 财务预测 (financial projections)

【融资情况】
Include:
- 融资历史 (previous funding rounds with dates and amounts)
- 投资方 (investors and their backgrounds)
- 融资用途 (use of funds)
- 估值情况 (valuation information)
